text: was a Japanese freelance video journalist covering wars and conflicts, refugees, poverty, AIDS, and child education around the world. In October 2014, he was captured and held hostage in Syria by Islamic State (ISIL) militants. After being held for three months, on 31 January 2015, he was beheaded.http://abcnews.go.com/International/wireStory/online-video-purports- show-islamic-state-group-beheading-28630748 ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Japanese activists Category:Christians Category:Kidnapped people Category:Japanese journalists Category:Murders by blade weapons Category:People from Sendai
title: Kenji Goto
